---
title: ".flipt.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines configuration for the Flipt tool, specifying which files to include and exclude when searching for feature flag definitions. It includes all files ending with ".features.yml", except for a specific file named "exclude.features.yml".

## Configuration
This code defines configuration options for the Flipt tool.

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| `version` | string |  | Specifies the version of the Flipt configuration format. |
| `include` | list |  | A list of file patterns to include when searching for feature flag definitions. |
| `exclude` | list |  | A list of file patterns to exclude when searching for feature flag definitions. |
